channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Three in four Europeans support the use of AI by police and military, study says
item.description: Most Europeans support the use of AI technologies like facial recognition by the police and military for surveillance, a report from IE University fou...

item.title: Robinhood rolls out high-risk margin trading in the UK after getting regulator nod
item.description: Robinhood said Monday that it's rolling out margin investing — or the ability for investors to borrow cash to augment their trades — in the U.K.

item.title: JDE Peet's rallies after Mondelez stake bought at a premium
Boeing shares rise on tentative labor pact with union
Georgia islanders rush to rescue survivors as dock walkway collapse kills 7 after annual Gullah festival
item.description: Orange life jackets bobbed in the water, where bystanders rushed to form a human chain for passing survivors to safety.

item.title: 10-year Treasury yield rises above 4.11% as investors monitor Fed speeches
item.description: The U.S. 10-year Treasury yield rose above 4.11% on Monday as investors awaited a flurry of speeches from Federal Reserve policymakers.

item.title: What went wrong at CVS
item.description: An activist shareholder demanding changes, soaring medical costs, and a $68 billion deal for Aetna.

item.title: Britain faces warnings of a tech exodus over tax plans ahead of high-stakes budget
item.description: Technology bosses and investors warn the U.K. could face an exodus of entrepreneurs if the government hikes capital gains tax — a levy on investment p...

item.title: Europe’s tech lag is the ‘single biggest long-term challenge’ for EU security, top German diplomat warns
item.description: Wolfgang Ischinger made his dire prediction at the Munich Security Conference, also known as "Davos with guns".

item.title: Goldman Sachs upgrades Warby Parker to buy, cites strong margin growth as catalyst
item.description: Warby Parker's promising outlook justifies its premium valuation, according to Goldman Sachs.

item.title: Elliott may get Southwest board seats under potential settlement, reports say
Tesla reports earnings this week. The focus could shift ‘back to fundamentals.’
This stock market rotation is the ‘lifeblood’ of the bull market
NHTSA investigating Tesla full self-driving
item.description: Tesla’s FSD has been installed in some 2.4 million vehicles.

item.title: CEO of Amazon-owned Ring says ignoring fear got her to corner office: ‘Successful people just drown out all the noise’
item.description: The CEO of Amazon-owned home security device Ring discusses what got her to the C-suite and her leadership philosophy.
